    • Uses of Square in chess

      Fields in chess declared as Square 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      Square[][] Board.board
      8x8 array of squares that contain chess pieces
      (package private) Square[][] Game.board
      Array of squares to represent the actual board with pieces on it.
      private Square Board.enpassant
      Current Enpassant square.
      (package private) Square Game.prevEnpassant
      The previous enpassant square.

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Square Board.getEnpassant()
      Accessor method that returns the current Enpassant square.

      Searches for a certain colored King's position on the board
      Methods in chess that return types with arguments of type Square 
      Modifier and Type Method Description

      Get a list of all of the squares that contain a piece that can attack the king.

      Gets the squares of a selected color.
      Methods in chess with parameters of type Square 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean Board.canMove​(Square curSquare, Square destSquare)
      Determines whether the piece on the currently selected square can move to the destination square successfully.
      boolean Game.canMove​(Square[][] board, Square curSquare, Square destSquare)
      Determines whether the piece on the currently selected square can move to the destination square successfully.
      private java.util.ArrayList<Square> Game.getKingAttackers​(Square[][] board, Square kingSquare)
      Get a list of all of the squares that contain a piece that can attack the king.
      boolean Game.isCheck​(Square[][] board, Square curSquare)
      Determines if the selected square can be attacked by an enemy piece
      boolean Game.isCheckmate​(Square[][] board, Square kingSquare)
      Determines if there are no possible moves that can get a king out of check.
      boolean Board.isUnderAttack​(Square curSquare, java.lang.String enemyColor)
      Method that determines whether the Square curSquare would be able to be attacked by a piece of enemyColor
      private Square Game.kingLocation​(Square[][] board, java.lang.String color)
      Searches for a certain colored King's position on the board
      void Game.movePiece​(Square[][] board, Square curSquare, Square destSquare)
      Moves the piece on the currently selected square to the destination square
      private void Game.promotion​(Pawn curPawn, Square destSquare, char newType)
      When a pawn reaches the last row of the opposite board it is exchanged for a different piece of the same color.
      void Board.setEnpassant​(Square piece)
      Mutator method that changes the enpassant field to the parameter.
      private boolean Game.simulateMove​(Square[][] board, Square curSquare, Square destSquare)
      Simulates a move using a combination of canMove and isCheck.
